analysis.description:
Reentrancy in PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#1136-1161):
	External calls:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaised)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#1149-1153)
	- tokensBought = getToken().balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#1154-1158)
	External calls sending eth:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaised)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#1149-1153)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensBought (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#1154-1158)

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#1136-1161) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#1136-1161) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0
PreICOProxyBuyer.getState (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#653-668):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#664)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#665-668)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#494-550):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#501-514)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#517-521)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#540)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#536-538)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#494-550):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#501-514)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#517-521)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#541-543)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#542-543)

PreICOProxyBuyer.claim (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#1190-1206) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-getToken().transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#1204-1205)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#494-550):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#501-514)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#517-521)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#529-533)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#526)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#533-535)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#567-585):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#572-574)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#577-578)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#578-582)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#576)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#805-836) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#829-836)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#825-836)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#347-348)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#298)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x7802ab7bb21da4dab4d7f8fefbbd278fc1068417.sol#328)
